text: Anthony J. "Tony" Barbieri (born August 26, 1963) is an American comedic writer and performer. He began writing for Jimmy Kimmel Live! in 2003. In 2004, he started appearing on the show as the character "Jake Byrd". He won the an Emmy Award for the song "I'm Fucking Matt Damon" in 2008. ==References== * Category:1963 births Category:American stand-up comedians Category:American voice actors Category:Comedians from Massachusetts Category:Living people Category:Writers from Massachusetts Category:American Emmy Award winners
title: Tony Barbieri
